metadata.title: CVE-2018-20065 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Handling of URI action in PDFium in Google Chrome prior to 71.0.3578.80allowed a remote attacker to initiate potentially unsafe navigationswithout a user gesture via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
